name: Ghibli
prompt: Take this photo and convert it into an HD, Ghibli-style anime artwork. The image should have soft, hand-drawn lines, rich, vibrant colors, and intricate details, like those seen in Studio Ghibli films such as Spirited Away or My Neighbor Totoro. The background should pay attention to the details found in traditional Ghibli animation. Please ensure the characters and scenery have a dreamlike, artistic quality with soft shading and an enchanting, serene mood.

name: Anime
prompt: Convert the attached image into a vibrant, detailed anime-style illustration. Preserve the characterâ€™s main features but add clean line art, colorful shading, and large expressive eyes typical of Japanese anime. The background should match an anime aesthetic with bright colors and dynamic lighting.

name: Sketch
prompt: Transform the attached image into a rough, hand-drawn sketch. Focus on using fine pencil-like lines, minimal shading, and a monochromatic or grayscale color scheme, keeping a natural, unfinished feel.

name: Cartoon
prompt: Turn the attached image into a playful cartoon-style drawing. Keep the original features recognizable but simplify the shapes, exaggerate expressions, and use bold outlines with bright, vivid colors for a fun cartoonish look.
